sections.heading: Waiver of objections to venueA
sections.text: An objection to the venue may not be waived prior to the institution of the action.B. The venue provided in Articles 2006, 2811, 2812, 3941, 3993, 4031 through 4034, and 4542 may not be waived.C. Except as otherwise provided in this article or by other law, any object
